title: Cantonese beef with peppers and pasta
ingredients: ['2 tbsp dry sherry', '2 tbsp dark soy sauce', '1 tsp toasted sesame oil', '2 large garlic cloves, crushed', '15g fresh root ginger, peeled and finely chopped', '2 tbsp fermented black beans, rinsed', '1 tsp sugar', '500g lean rump steak, trimmed of fat and cut across the grain into thin slices', '300g penne (pasta quills)', '2 tbsp vegetable oil', '1 large onion, roughly chopped', '2 green peppers, deseeded and roughly chopped', '220g can water chestnuts, drained']
